display_name: [Chaos Brought by the God of Destruction] Beerus

kit.leader_skill: "Successors" or "Legendary Existence" Category Ki +3 and HP, ATK & DEF +130%

super_attack.name: God of Destruction's Rampage
super_attack.effect: Raises ATK & DEF; Causes supreme damage to enemy; Recovers 5% HP

passive_skill.name: Foreboding Tension
passive_skill.effect: Activates the Entrance Animation when HP is 99% or less at the start of the character's attacking turn, or when there is another "Successors" Category ally attacking in the same turn at the start of the character's attacking turn: (Once) ATK & DEF 150% up; (Once) Guards all attacks for 7 turns; (Once) High chance of launching an additional Super Attack for 7 turns; (Once) Randomly changes Ki Spheres of a certain Type to Rainbow Ki Spheres; (Once) High chance of evading enemy's attack; (Once) Launches an additional attack that has a high chance of becoming a Super Attack; (Once) "Successors" Category allies' Ki +2 and ATK & DEF 50% up; When attacking with 12 or more Ki: ATK & DEF 150% up; When HP is 90% or more: DEF 150% up; When HP is 90% or less: Launches an additional Super Attack; When HP is 70% or less: Launches an additional Super Attack; When facing only 1 enemy: ATK & chance of performing a critical hit 50% up when the enemy's HP is 50% or more; ATK & chance of performing a critical hit 50% up when the enemy's HP is 80% or more
